Alpha::

"Agree"said Alpha "If you like you can take control of my body a 
while and next you will let me control it... what do you think?"



--- In nbwrpg@y..., wingedwarrior41@h... wrote:
> AzureBlade: Alpha... You hear me do you? I was terminated... or 
> almost. I was created to have a spark like that of Starscream's. It 
> seems the scientists who made me have been successful. In other 
words, 
> my spark is nearly impossible to annihilate. If you allow me, I 
will 
> stay inside you for a moment. I need your help, though...
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@y..., Airshadow Nightlight <airly2000@y...> wrote:
> > 
> > Alpha::
> > Alpha  couldn't heard any word of Azura Blade's spark  but saw 
how 
> his spark enter to her body. Alpha fainted; inside her, she  could 
see 
> Azure Blade "What's going on?"said the femme "What happened 
Azure???"
> >   wingedwarrior41@h... wrote: Spark: Alpha... My body... I would 
not 
> have left it if it would have 
> > still been viable... but it is a total loss...
> >

> >

femme

she

pretty

> > > > have created another Starscream... and I AM HE!!!!!! 
NEVER!!!! I 
> > do 
> > > > not want this!

but

> came 
> > > > closer.
